# eslint/no-useless-concat <Badge type="info" text="Suspicious" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow unnecessary concatenation of literals or template literals

### Why is this bad?

Itâ€™s unnecessary to concatenate two strings together.

### Example

```javascript
var foo = "a" + "b";
```
